About

Hi there! I'm a PhD candidate of the Programme on Innovation, Economics and Governance for Development (IEGD) from UNU-MERIT. I'm doing research on scientific networks and I have been using quite a lot R for almost everything... I hope this blog can help you to facilitate the process of reading, analysis and visualisation of data. I will focus on common bibliometric databases such as Web of Science (WOS). .
